oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sam Houston portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of Sam Houston (1793-1863) made when he was a U.S. Senator. Photograph from the original Plate. Sitting portrait from waist up, Houston carries a walking stick in one hand and hat rests on his knee. Image 14 of 16 in folder. From The Raven: A Biography of Sam Houston.
Houson served as U.S. Senator from Texas, 1846-1859.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Houston, Sam, 1793-1863
Houston, Sam, 1793-1863;Tennessee. Governor;Legislators--United States
Legislators
